instructions.name: initializeController
docs: Initialize a Controller on chain account.
Parameters:
- redeemable_mint_decimals: the decimals of the redeemable mint.
Note:
Only one Controller on chain account will ever exist due to the
PDA derivation seed having no variations.
Note:
In the case of UXDProtocol this is the one in charge of the UXD mint,
and it has been locked to a single Controller to ever exist by only
having one possible derivation. (but it's been made generic, and we
could have added the authority to the seed generation for instance).

accounts.name: authority
docs: #1 Authored call accessible only to the signer matching Controller.authority

accounts.name: controller
docs: #3 The top level UXDProgram on chain account managing the redeemable mint

docs: #4 The redeemable mint managed by the `controller` instance

instructions.name: freezeProgram
docs: Freeze or resume all ixs associated with the controller (except this one).
Parameters:
- freeze: bool param to flip the `is_frozen` property in the controller
Note:
This is a wildcard to stop the program temporarily when a vulnerability has been detected to allow the team to do servicing work.

errors.name: InvalidRedeemableMintDecimals
errors.msg: The redeemable mint decimals must be between 0 and 9 (inclusive).

errors.name: InvalidRedeemableGlobalSupplyCap
errors.msg: Redeemable global supply above.

errors.name: InvalidDepositoriesWeightBps
errors.msg: Depositories weights do not add up to 100%.

errors.name: InvalidDepositoriesVector
errors.msg: Depositories vector passed as parameter is not of the expected length

errors.name: InvalidCollateralAmount
errors.msg: Collateral amount cannot be 0

errors.name: InvalidRedeemableAmount
errors.msg: Redeemable amount must be > 0 in order to redeem.

errors.name: InsufficientCollateralAmount
errors.msg: The balance of the collateral ATA is not enough to fulfill the mint operation.

errors.name: InsufficientRedeemableAmount
errors.msg: The balance of the redeemable ATA is not enough to fulfill the redeem operation.

errors.name: DepositoriesTargerRedeemableAmountReached
errors.msg: Minting amount would go past the depositories target redeemable amount.

errors.name: RedeemableGlobalSupplyCapReached
errors.msg: Minting amount would go past the Redeemable Global Supply Cap.

errors.name: RedeemableMercurialVaultAmountUnderManagementCap
errors.msg: Minting amount would go past the mercurial vault depository Redeemable Amount Under Management Cap.

errors.name: RedeemableCredixLpAmountUnderManagementCap
errors.msg: Minting amount would go past the credix lp depository Redeemable Amount Under Management Cap.

errors.name: MathOverflow
errors.msg: Math overflow.

errors.name: SlippageReached
errors.msg: The order couldn't be executed with the provided slippage.

errors.name: BumpError
errors.msg: A bump was expected but is missing.

errors.name: MintingDisabled
errors.msg: Minting is disabled for the current depository.

errors.name: CollateralDepositHasRemainingDust
errors.msg: Collateral deposit left some value unaccounted for.

errors.name: CollateralDepositAmountsDoesntMatch
errors.msg: Collateral deposit didn't result in the correct amounts being moved.

errors.name: CollateralDepositDoesntMatchTokenValue
errors.msg: Received token of which the value doesn't match the deposited collateral.

errors.name: InvalidMercurialVaultLpMint
errors.msg: The mercurial vault lp mint does not match the Depository's one.

errors.name: MaxNumberOfMercurialVaultDepositoriesRegisteredReached
errors.msg: Cannot register more mercurial vault depositories, the limit has been reached.

errors.name: MaxNumberOfCredixLpDepositoriesRegisteredReached
errors.msg: Cannot register more credix lp depositories, the limit has been reached.

errors.name: MercurialVaultDoNotMatchCollateral
errors.msg: The provided collateral do not match the provided mercurial vault token.

errors.name: CredixLpDoNotMatchCollateral
errors.msg: The provided collateral do not match the provided credix lp token.

errors.name: CollateralMintEqualToRedeemableMint
errors.msg: Collateral mint should be different than redeemable mint.

errors.name: CollateralMintNotAllowed
errors.msg: Provided collateral mint is not allowed.

errors.name: MinimumMintedRedeemableAmountError
errors.msg: Mint resulted to 0 redeemable token being minted.

errors.name: MaximumMintedRedeemableAmountError
errors.msg: Mint resulted into too much redeemable token being minted.

errors.name: MinimumRedeemedCollateralAmountError
errors.msg: Redeem resulted to 0 collateral token being redeemed.

errors.name: MaximumRedeemedCollateralAmountError
errors.msg: Redeem resulted into too much collateral token being redeemed.

errors.name: InvalidDepositoryLpTokenVault
errors.msg: The depository lp token vault does not match the Depository's one.

errors.name: InvalidAuthority
errors.msg: Only the Program initializer authority can access this instructions.

errors.name: InvalidController
errors.msg: The Depository's controller doesn't match the provided Controller.

errors.name: InvalidDepository
errors.msg: The Depository provided is not registered with the Controller.

errors.name: InvalidCollateralMint
errors.msg: The provided collateral mint does not match the depository's collateral mint.

errors.name: InvalidRedeemableMint
errors.msg: The Redeemable Mint provided does not match the Controller's one.

errors.name: InvalidOwner
errors.msg: The provided token account is not owner by the expected party.

errors.name: InvalidDepositoryCollateral
errors.msg: The provided depository collateral does not match the depository's one.

errors.name: InvalidDepositoryShares
errors.msg: The provided depository shares does not match the depository's one.

errors.name: InvalidProfitsBeneficiaryCollateral
errors.msg: The Profits beneficiary collateral provided does not match the depository's one.

errors.name: InvalidMercurialVault
errors.msg: The provided mercurial vault does not match the Depository's one.

errors.name: InvalidMercurialVaultCollateralTokenSafe
errors.msg: The provided mercurial vault collateral token safe does not match the mercurial vault one.

errors.name: RedeemableIdentityDepositoryAmountUnderManagementCap
errors.msg: Minting amount would go past the identity depository Redeemable Amount Under Management Cap.

errors.name: ProgramAlreadyFrozenOrResumed
errors.msg: Program is already frozen/resumed.

errors.name: ProgramFrozen
errors.msg: The program is currently in Frozen state.

errors.name: InvalidCredixProgramState
errors.msg: The Credix ProgramState isn't the Depository one.

errors.name: InvalidCredixGlobalMarketState
errors.msg: The Credix GlobalMarketState isn't the Depository one.

errors.name: InvalidCredixSigningAuthority
errors.msg: The Credix SigningAuthority isn't the Depository one.

errors.name: InvalidCredixLiquidityCollateral
errors.msg: The Credix LiquidityCollateral isn't the Depository one.

errors.name: InvalidCredixSharesMint
errors.msg: The Credix SharesMint isn't the Depository one.

errors.name: InvalidCredixPass
errors.msg: The Credix Pass isn't the one owned by the correct depository.

errors.name: InvalidCredixPassNoFees
errors.msg: The Credix Pass doesn't have the fees exemption.

errors.name: InvalidCredixTreasury
errors.msg: The Credix Treasury isn't the ProgramState one.

errors.name: InvalidCredixTreasuryPoolCollateral
errors.msg: The Credix TreasuryPool isn't the GlobalMarketState one.

errors.name: InvalidCredixWithdrawEpochRequestPhase
errors.msg: The Credix WithdrawEpoch isn't in its request phase.

errors.name: InvalidCredixWithdrawEpochRedeemPhase
errors.msg: The Credix WithdrawEpoch isn't in its redeem phase.

errors.name: Default
errors.msg: Default - Check the source code for more info.

errors.name: MaximumOutflowAmountError
errors.msg: Redeem resulted into too much outflow in this epoch, please wait or try again with a smaller amount.

errors.name: InvalidOutflowLimitPerEpochBps
errors.msg: The outflow_limit_per_epoch_bps is invalid: over 100%.
